document_data.name: ''Robe of Blending (Warning 3-speed)''
document_data.creator: [[Nimrod of Nump]]
document_data.author: [[John M. Maxstadt]]
document_data.title: Yet Even More [Gods Forbid] Outrages From the Mages
document_data.Description: Apparently a normal [[robe]] in all respects, its clasp possessed a sliding switch with four settings: off, chop, mix, and liquefy.
document_data.Powers: The wearer blended into the environment, ground, and indeed air to a degree defined by each speed setting.
